name: Book City Tours
overview:
BookCityTours is an online portal for booking sightseeing and city tours, excursions, attractions, activities and thing to do. You can book travel experiences in more then 100 cities worldwide via it’s website. BookCityTours.com offers a wide range of walking, bike, boat and bus tours around in cities like Rome, Paris, Amsterdam, London, New York, Sydney and Tokyo (among many more!)

See it, Book it, Do it ! Ever wish you could travel to a new city and just for once not feel like a tourist, to know in advance all the best the city has to offer? Have you ever wanted to have all the resources of one city all in one place? Book City Tours is a compilation of all the best tours and activities all on one website designed to make booking your next vacation as effortless as possible while ensuring an excellent value, outstanding quality and superior service.

Founded in September 2012 as a project of the makers of www.AmsterdamCityTours.com it is headquartered in The Netherlands with regional offices in Berlin and St Petersburg, Russia.

BookCityTours is a privately held company.
